mapper.select: SELECT A.*, R1.name AS province_name, R2.name AS city_name, R3.name AS district_name, CONCAT(R1.name, R2.name, R3.name) AS full_region FROM address A LEFT JOIN region R1 on A.province_id = R1.id LEFT JOIN region R2 on A.city_id = R2.id LEFT JOIN region R3 on A.district_id = R3.id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT A.*, R1.name AS province_name, R2.name AS city_name, R3.name AS district_name, CONCAT(R1.name, R2.name, R3.name) AS full_region FROM address A LEFT JOIN region R1 on A.province_id = R1.id LEFT JOIN region R2 on A.city_id = R2.id LEFT JOIN region R3 on A.district_id = R3.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
